## R Regular Expression

### R library stringr
```{r stringr}
library(stringr)
myStr <- "This is a string."
```

### R character classes
- [:digit:] [:alpha:]
- [:lower:] [:upper:]
- [:alnum:]
- [:punct:]

### Methods
#### str_extract(string, pattern) str_extract_all(string, pattern)

```{r}
str_extract(myStr, "is")
```
